text: Miliusa parviflora is a species of plant in the family Annonaceae. It is endemic to Peninsular Malaysia. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== * Kochummen, K.M. 1998. Miliusa parviflora. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species.
